sentences.en: A cataclysm caused by the dam breaking.
sentences.cn: 一场因水坝破裂所造成的大洪水.

sentences.en: A nuclear cataclysm , on the other hand , could destroy the earth tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 又或者一场核爆, 地球的明天就不复存在了.

sentences.en: Cataclysm ( Destruction ) - Now also increases your chance to hit with Destruction spells by 1 % per point.
sentences.cn: 灾变 ( 毁灭 ) - 现在每点也增加毁灭法术命中1%.

sentences.en: I thought that Hiroshima still felt the impact of the atomic cataclysm.
sentences.cn: 我原以为广岛仍旧还在原子弹灾难的影响之下.

sentences.en: In The Possessed the earth quakes: it is not the catastrophe that befalls the imaginative individual, but a cataclysm in which a large portion of humanity is buried, wiped out forever.
sentences.cn: 在《魔鬼》中发生了地震，这不仅是降临在富于想象力的人头上的大灾难，而是一大半人类被埋葬于其中、永远被消灭的大地震。

sentences.en: Q . Will Cataclysm bring the return of special - proc items such as The Unstoppable Force?
sentences.cn: 大灾变中, 那些有特殊触发效果的装备会回归吗,比如说无坚不摧之力(猪头锤)?

sentences.en: Queen Azshara will also play a major part in Cataclysm.
sentences.cn: 艾萨拉女王同样扮演了重量级角色.

sentences.en: The cataclysm flooded the entire valley.
The end of the world through some global cataclysm or war?
sentences.cn: 由于世界性灾难或战争导致世界的末日?

sentences.en: The extinct volcano's eruption would mean a cataclysm for the city.
sentences.cn: 死火山又重新喷发,对这座城市来说意味着大难临头.

sentences.en: The floods were a cataclysm from which the local people never recovered.
sentences.cn: 经历了这场特大洪水,当地人民元气大伤,很难恢复.

sentences.en: The latest Cataclysm beta adds new Inscription spells to create Alchemy Tarot, to raise Alchemy skill.
sentences.cn: 大灾变的最新更新中加入了新的铭文技能,可制造炼金塔罗牌用来提高炼金术技能.

sentences.en: The shrewd and tenacious goblins are the Horde's newest playable race with the Cataclysm expansion.
sentences.cn: 精明而又顽强的地精是资料片大灾变中部落方的全新种族.

sentences.en: These exotic instruments have not yet produced the cataclysm thatJeremiahs have long forecast.
sentences.cn: 这些奇异的工具尚未造成像Jermiahs很久前预料的大灾难.

sentences.en: This over - organized universe is violently transformed by the cataclysm, becoming fantastic and absurd.
sentences.cn: 这个过于有条理的世界被一场突如其来的灾难粗暴地扭曲, 变得荒谬离奇.

sentences.en: Two towering cymbal crashes end cataclysm in G minor.
sentences.cn: 两声突出的铙钹将动荡的乐曲结束在G小调.
